data.title: Dirty
data.text: I know its been there for many years, but had never gone. Hubby suggested we go. The burger tasted exactly like whataburger it was good, but the place was old and dirty.

data.title: Good Chicken At Hamburger King
data.text: The Hamburger King is a land mark in Edinburg, It has been there ever since I can remember. The Fried Chicken is excellent in taste but their portions are less than average. If you want and order a chicken breast, you might get 1/3 of a breast. If you like dark meat, go for the three thighs. That is a good deal. Best to go when you see the parking lot full, that way you know the chicken is fresh. Often times one of your three pieces is a re-fried piece. Staff is not very friendly, service is okay, the chicken is good.

data.title: Try the onion rings...
data.text: I’m always on the lookout for local eating joints and as part of my “Burger Quest” I came across this place through a friend’s suggestion. Ambiance, the place definitely has that hometown charm, look, and feel. The menu is simple and posted on the board. They offer both counter and table service. Taste: I appreciated the fresh taste of the lettice, tomato and onion, but unfortunately the burger seemed to taste less than ordinary. The onion rings were great however, and tasted good. They had a chicken platter that looked good, so that may be the next thing to try in a future visit.
